definition: to touch/to come in contact with/to feel/to be affected by/to catch fire/to burn/(coll.) to fall asleep/(after a verb) hitting the mark/succeeding in
aspect particle indicating action in progress

sentences.english: Not sure if it is implantation bleeding or period? Check the color.
sentences.chinese: 不确定是着床性出血还是月经？检查颜色。

sentences.english: It suggests that these integrins may take part in the process of implantation in mouse.
sentences.chinese: 提示它们可能参与小鼠胚泡的着床过程。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the effects of leptin on development of mouse preimplantation embryos in vitro.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨瘦素在体外对小鼠着床前胚胎发育的影响。

sentences.english: To observe the effect of Bushen Huoxue prescription on blastocyst nidation in pregnancy mice.
sentences.chinese: 观察中药补肾活血方对妊娠大鼠胚泡着床率的影响。

sentences.english: Just like in the bed magnetic gentle tearing by dragging the implantation.
sentences.chinese: 就像在床上磁性的温柔撕拽着床被。

sentences.english: Preimplantation development of reconstructed embryos by nuclear transfer was studied.
sentences.chinese: 小鼠体细胞核移植重构胚的着床前发育情况。

sentences.english: The subject is the effect on the ability of embryos to attach to the uterus.
sentences.chinese: 研究的主题是BPA对于受精卵在子宫着床的影响。

sentences.english: That would be the implantation of the fertilized egg into the woman's uterus.
sentences.chinese: 着床就是受精卵进入了妇女的子宫。

sentences.english: Non-identical twins are the result of two fertilised eggs implanting in the uterus at the same time.
sentences.chinese: 非同卵双生子是两个受精卵同时在子宫内着床的结果。

sentences.english: But his gaze at the foot of the bed relaxed slowly.
sentences.chinese: 他那凝视着床的脚端的目光松驰了。

definition: (of a married couple) to have intercourse/(literary) to share the same room/of the same family branch
